channel.title: How can i ban an item?
channel.description:
I want to delete/ban whips from my server because they are bugged. Anyone know how/if i can do this?
Thanks

item.title: How can i ban an item?
item.dc:creator: @revol_2 revol 2
item.description:
@revol_2 wrote:

Just go in your Item.Cfg and delete your abbysal whip…people will still can have that but it wont attack it will do no effect…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2007, 06:28:52 PM[/size][hr]i mean like they will have it in their hand but when they will attack the weapon will go off they will attack with their hand and the whip will go on back it will be there only for the look…

Read full topic
item.source: How can i ban an item?
